Articles.Content: I have been watching the forums since near the end of .18 but never bothered to get an account. It will be interesting on how much better it is to participate on the forums rather than just read the discussions.
Hi, welcome aboard. Always a good time to become active on the forum .

Thank you;

Now I just have to work out this Ã¢â‚¬Å“posting thingÃ¢â‚¬Â. I have tried posting to two other forums but I am not sure if it worked on both. On the second one I got a little box telling me I was waiting for a mod to approve my post but the first I did not see that.

Welcome to the forums.

Yeah, we'll have to approve your posts manually till you get over 5 posts, then the restriction is lifted.
Welcome aboard! The first posts are always weird, aren't they?

Vexx32 - i knew that i would need to be approved it is just that i have a buggy internet connection / browser so i get logged out quite often and sometimes I don't know if a post went through. i got logged out just trying to post this.

Hi! Welcome to the forums! Hope ya will enjoy your stay.

Welcome aboard! The first posts are always weird, aren't they?

I was like that too. xD
